title: Misfit polishes up the Shine 2 with more accurate tracking, even slimmer design
text:
Misfit polishes up the Shine 2 with more accurate tracking, even slimmer design 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Yesterday 
Misfit's new Shine adds improved fitness and sleep tracking, but it's also got fun different-colored lights, and the ability to alert you to...
